idea: To undertake repair & servicing of bike, cars and other automotive. Sale and purchase of spare parts of bike, cars & other automotive. The repair & servicing would be done with the help of online tools like website and mobile applications.

idea:
We create and supplement the next generation ways and means of sharing the knowledge and information, meaningfully, across all the digital platforms. With our core founder team having huge expertise and experience in online technologies; eChaarya has developed and built a unique cloud-based e-learning platform called “class4all” using .net technology. The platform is now commercially available on the internet, smartphones, and tablets.

Our vision is to ensure that online quality learning and education is easily accessible to each and everyone, improving their learning skills, enhancing confidence and chances of employability. Our online learning platform is equipped with the numerous functions in order to provide a unique online learning experience to both the teachers as well as students. for more information please visit our website at https://www.echaarya.com/profile.php
name: ECHAARYA LLP

idea:
Lumiere Glass Llp has been formed with the intention to produce high quality Cosmetic & Perfume glass bottles and packaging to service the premium cosmetic and perfume manufacturing segment. It will be a 100% Export Oriented Unit. Currently there is only one player in India who is servicing this segment - Piramal Glass Ltd. who manufactures the ware from conventional large natural gas based furnaces.


We will be the first manufacturer in India to produce glass bottles from an electrically operated glass melting furnace. This will enable us to:


i. Have a zero carbon footprint, zero air pollution, zero effluents. 

ii. Produce premium quality glass - the best in India.

iii. Start up with a low investment - Less than 50% of that of natural gas fired furnace.

iv. Start with lower capacities than conventional furnaces which have a higher break even point.


The business model is very customer-centric- We aim to provide a total packaging solution to the buyer- right from in-house designing to the complete packaging- Caps, closures, decoration etc., to be virtually a one stop shop for the buyer, thus easing his procurement problems. 


The plant is designed to produce low MOQ's ( Minimum Order Quantity) enabling the buyers to benefit with higher inventory turns, helping him to keep his inventory costs low, thus maximising his cash flow and profits.


The production capacity will be 7200 metric tons per year which roughly translates into approx 21 million bottles annually.
name: LUMIERE GLASS LLP

idea: TalentEd is a combination of “Talent” and “Ed”. Talent denotes to Talent & Skill whereas, “Ed” denotes to Education. TalentEd is the only platform where we endeavour to bring together all the talent and skill activities relating to Sports, Art & Culture, Science & Technology and Education from worldwide. People will get access to the complete “ECO-SYSTEM” including but not limited to the time and venue of the upcoming competitions or events worldwide, authors will be invited to write articles/ blogs to educate students and talented people worldwide, service providers and manufacturers in the fields of Sports and Art & Culture, Science & Technology and Education can reach the desired crowd quickly, catch and spread current affairs in the areas of Sports and Art & Culture Science & Technology and Education and much more.
name: INTENSE INTELLECT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
The company is into a smart eCommerce portal for enabling sale of handmade and socially responsible goods. It supports  indigenous sellers all over the country to reach un-reached markets and improve the quality of their products.


The platform will be supported by a financial system where each and every component such as the customer, merchant, banks and vendors can feel secure and independent.

The whole system is made smart through use of breakthrough AI technologies to reduce human interference.


Our mission is to reach and connect every corner of the country for such sellers and buyers.
name: LYNGUM INNOVATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Wopreneur is a Media company with its own app, monthly magazine and micro influencer agency based out of Mumbai.
name: Wopreneur Media Private Limited

idea: Aimcrest venture is incorporated to create a start-up ecosystem that addresses the two biggest challenges faced by start-ups (1) finding customers for products (2) raising capital.   In this regard we have created a digital platform that onboards corporates who are customers to the start-ups, and VC and HNI investors who will assess the start-ups prospects based on business traction.  We have also partnered with Govt of Maharashtra to help power their start-up ecosystem.
name: AIMCREST VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED
